short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to close duplicate tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep your browser organized and clutter-free with the Close Duplicate Tabs extension. This simple yet powerful tool automatically identifies and closes duplicate tabs, helping you manage your browsing sessions more efficiently.

Features:

Automatic Duplicate Detection: The extension scans your open tabs and closes any duplicates, ensuring you only have unique tabs open.
One-Click Operation: Easily manage your tabs with a single click on the extension icon.
Lightweight and Efficient: Designed to be lightweight and efficient, the extension runs seamlessly in the background without impacting your browsing performance.
User-Friendly Interface: A clean and intuitive interface makes it easy for anyone to use.
How It Works:

Click on the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
The extension will automatically detect and close any duplicate tabs.
Enjoy a more organized and efficient browsing experience.
Why Use Close Duplicate Tabs?

Boost Productivity: Spend less time managing your tabs and more time focusing on what matters.
Reduce Clutter: Keep your browser neat and organized by eliminating duplicate tabs.
Improve Performance: Fewer open tabs can lead to better browser performance and lower memory usage.
Permissions:

The extension requires access to your tabs to identify and close duplicates.

Support and Feedback:

We value your feedback! If you have any suggestions or encounter any issues, please reach out to us through the support page.
